quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 아르젠타와 대화 2. 주교와 대화 3. 클림드와 대화 4. 귀족들과 돌아가며 대화

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Argenta$
Farewell, weakling.
(Go and report to Bishop Ignacio)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
It was a tough fight, but I heard the Prophet was rescued.
That's good news.

$Geraint$
You must be worried about the descendant of the Ancients. No one can touch her unless I die, so you don't have to worry.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
I heard the Prophet girl is still asleep. What a lazy girl… I knew this would happen! All the fuss about the Prophet was just a bluff!

$King Cassius$
I highly commend your role in saving the Prophet. But I was a little suprised that she looked like an ordinary country girl. A little disappointed actually… She doesn't even come to greet the King and continues to sleep...

$Duke Stuart$
According to the soldiers' reports, the one who brought Prophet to Royal Castle Basement was Gold Dragon.
…This is something to think about.

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. What could be the problem? We did our best to save her so let's leave the rest to the King. Anyway, you did a great job.

$Bishop Ignacio$
(Mumbling) This is bad… The Prophet…(Mumble) Geraint… Hmm, what should I do to...
(Bishop Ignacio seems to be lost in his thoughts)

$Argenta$
Farewell, weakling.

$Notice$
* You have completed [Chapter 4. Royal Castle Saint Haven].
* [Chapter 5. Geraint the Guardian] will be revealed during the next update.

Chapter 4. Saint Haven Royal Castle [END]

- The above sentence will be used when there is level limit at Lv32

$Geraint$
You must be worried about the descendant of the Ancients. No one can touch her unless I die, so you don't have to worry.

$King Cassius$
I highly commend your role in saving the Prophet. But I was a little suprised that she looked like an ordinary country girl. A little disappointed actually… She doesn't even come to greet the King and continues to sleep...

$Duke Stuart$
According to the soldiers' reports, the one who brought Prophet to Royal Castle Basement was Gold Dragon.
…This is something to think about.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I heard the Prophet girl is still asleep. What a lazy girl… I knew this would happen! All the fuss about the Prophet was just a bluff!

$General Douglas$
Mmm... I heard the Prophet is still asleep. What could be the problem? We did our best to save her so let's leave the rest to the King. Anyway, you did a great job.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
Oh, the true friend of Saint Haven!
Come!
(The bishop welcomes you with too much friendliness)

$Bishop Ignacio$
You are a true warrior who saved Saint Haven. You did a great job.
But… I should say I'm quite shocked. Velskud who was once a knight of the Royal Castle is using Black Dragon's power...

${user_nick}$
Yeah I'm not really sure what's going on….

$Bishop Ignacio$
The person who fought to stop the Black Dragon is now blinded by its power… It's weird and sad at the same time. What a pity…. (The bishop looks like he feels sad about the situation)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Moreover, the person who brought Prophet back is the Gold Dragon!
The nobles have been gossiping nonstop about this. They have been discussing about how to deal with the aftermath of the battle for some time but no conclusions are being made. I will call you when there's some progress, so come later.

*You can proceed at Lv32

$Bishop Ignacio$
Moreover, the person who brought Prophet back is the Gold Dragon!
The nobles have been gossiping nonstop about this. They have been discussing about how to deal with the aftermath of the battle for some time but no conclusions are being made.

$Bishop Ignacio$
I heard that you're the only one who can enter the place where the Prophet is.
The nobles seem to have many questions for you. Won't you go and talk to them?

${user_nick}$
Before that, I would like to send a message about how the Prophet is doing.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hmm? Oh yes of course. You are here to save the Prophet on another person's request. I forgot about it for awhile.
If you want to send a letter, you can talk to Elite Soldier Calrim. I'll notify him about it.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Go on.
Though the Black Dragon is now gone, now is the time where we get busy..

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You are a true warrior who saved Saint Haven. You did a great job.
* [You have completed Chapter 4. Royal Castle Saint Haven.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
It was a fierce battle, but I heard that you managed to resuce the Prophet.
That is really a relief.

$Bishop Ignacio$
If you want to send a letter, you can talk to Elite Soldier Calrim.

$Elite Soldier Calrim${action:Talk}
Oh, you mean a letter? You can give it to me.
I'll ask the envoys in the Royal Castle.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Erm… So you just want this to be sent to Prairie Town's Mayor Harold? Please write your name over here.
(Finished filling in the document)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Erm… So you just want this to be sent to Mana Ridge's Master Sorceress Cynthia? Please write your name over here.
(Finished filling in the document)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
Erm… So you just want this to be sent to Mana Ridge's Cleric Thomas? Please write your name over here.
(Finished filling in the document)

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
I'll make sure this letter reaches the recipient.
I'm sure the person will be happy to find out about the news.

${user_nick}$
Thank you.

$Elite Soldier Calrim$
You seem to be running off for something else now.
You must be really busy, with all the trust that Bishop Ignacio has on you.

$Elite Soldier Calrim${action:Talk}
I'll make sure this letter reaches the recipient so don't worry about that.
Are you going back to see Bishop Ignacio now?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Welcome back.
The people who have been worried about the Prophet must be relieved after hearing the news from your letter.

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
His highness and other nobles are discussing on how to deal with the Prophet and how to deal with the injured soldiers.
Since you are the only one who can enter where the Prophet is, won't you go and listen to what everyone is saying?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Try listening to them one by one.
First… start with his royal highness, King Cassius ?

$Bishop Ignacio$
A sleeping Prophet… A Gold Dragon who brought her here… Everyone seems to have there own thoughts on how to deal with this situation.
(Talk to King Cassius)

$King Cassius$
The soldiers were saying that the… Blond-haired Swordsman… is the Gold Dragon….
Why isn't he here to pay respects to me?
How r-rude….

${user_nick}$
You mean Geraint?

$King Cassius$
Geraint? That sounds like one of the heroes who fought the Black Dragon… But the name Geraint is so common nowadays….
A-anyway, this palace is mine, but he came in here without my permissions and locked himself up... How rude... (Cassius timidly shows his discontent)

$King Cassius$
By right I should drag him out and show the power of a king… But since he has achieved much for our kingdom, I will forgive him this time.
Keep the Prophet safe for me.

$King Cassius$
I will leave my uncle and General Douglas to deal with the injured soldiers. I can… do that… right?
(He peeks at Duke Stuart)

$Bishop Ignacio$
A sleeping Prophet… A Gold Dragon who brought her here… Everyone seems to have there own thoughts on how to deal with this situation.
(Talk to Duke Stuart)

$King Cassius$
Uncle said that it's not a bad idea to keep the Gold Dragon at the basement. I'm trying to think so too.
(Talk to Duke Stuart)

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
I thought all dragons were bad. This is a suprise for me.
Moreover, the Gold Dragon appeared in a human form with the Prophet… Isn't that amazing?
So this is what I thought.

$Duke Stuart$
The evil dragon was touched by the benevolence of our young king and came to Saint Haven to protect His Majesty. Oh... What a beautiful story! (The duke is touched by a story that he just made up)

$Duke Stuart$
If we pack this story well and spread it across the kingdom, all the people will be happy and worship the king. Achieving a great victory against the Black Knight was all thanks to our king! That's right.

$Duke Stuart$
What have the soldiers done apart from making noise about their pay and asking for reinforcements?
Ehem, well I'm not smirking at the loyalty of General Douglas... ehem. (The duke peeks at the general)

$Duke Stuart$
Well I need to get ready to spread the glorious victory our king has brought, so you should get going too. I'm sure you are happy for the king as well since you've fought so loyally for him.
(General Douglas is listening to what the duke is saying with a stiff face)

$Duke Stuart${action:Stand2}
What have the soldiers done apart from making noise about their pay and asking for reinforcements? Ehem….
(Talk to General Douglas)

$King Cassius$
My uncle is always right… but I think… General Douglas did a lot in this battle too…
(Talk to General Douglas)

$Bishop Ignacio$
A sleeping Prophet… A Gold Dragon who brought her here… Everyone seems to have there own thoughts on how to deal with this situation.
(Talk to General Douglas)

$General Douglas${action:Talk}
I heard that the Prophet is not waking up. And the knight who helped us in the war was in fact the Gold Dragon….
This is unbelievable.

$General Douglas$
So many things happened at once. I'm afraid this might stir the people up. The duke and the bishop are planning on creating a nice story to keep the people assured... But that's all they think about. They seem to have forgotten about the sacrifices that our soldiers made. (General Douglas looks unhappy)

$General Douglas$
We have fought so many monsters head on, so the damage on the army is huge. The duke only thinks about the Gold Dragon now. I find it a pity that the soldiers are not getting the amount of recognition that they deserve. (He looks really dissatisfied)

$General Douglas$
I think we should hurry with treating the injured soldiers and focus on killing the remnant monsters.
I wonder what Court Sorceress Kayleen thinks.

$General Douglas$
I don't know what the other nobles are thinking, but I feel that we should focus on treating the injured soldiers and killing the remnant monsters.
(Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$Bishop Ignacio$
A sleeping Prophet… A Gold Dragon who brought her here… Everyone seems to have there own thoughts on how to deal with this situation.
(Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$King Cassius$
I hope the Prophet wakes up soon and comes to pay respect to me. When do you think she'll wake up?
(Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$Duke Stuart$
Hmm…The Gold Dragon vows to become the guardian dragon after witnessing the benevolence of our king! …How's that?
(Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen${action:Talk}
After hearing the news about the Gold Dragon, that sly bishop's face turned white like a ghost. You should have seen that too.
It was SO FUNNY! HAHAHA(Kayleen laughs loudly)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I don't care whether there is a Gold Dragon at the basement or not.
But the Prophet can't continue to sleep forever.
If she is the Prophet, she should give a prophecy. That's what a Prophet should do. Don't you think so?

${user_nick}$
I'm a little worried that she's not waking up

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Yeah I know~ You must be feeling the same way as I do.
Don't worry. I'll wake her up with the arcane magic of the sorceresses. Wait and see.

${user_nick}$
Is that possible?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Of course I'm not going to do it now. Everything in this world needs preparation! (Kayleen hurriedly searches a gigantic book)
I think I saw it here... Wait, is this the wrong book…
(Turns pages frantically) Hey what are you looking at!!

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
aI will get things ready so in the meanwhile, go and talk to that sly old bishop.

$General Douglas$
I don't know what the other nobles are thinking, but I feel that we should focus on treating the injured soldiers and killing the remnant monsters.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio)

$King Cassius$
I hope the Prophet wakes up soon and comes to pay respect to me. When do you think she'll wake up?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio)

$Duke Stuart$
Hmm…The Gold Dragon vows to become the guardian dragon after witnessing the benevolence of our king! …How's that?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
aI will get things ready so in the meanwhile, go and talk to that sly old bishop.?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio)

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You should have realized it now after listening to all of them, but everyone is busy with what they have on their plate.
I'm most worried about the Prophet.

$Bishop Ignacio$
The Prophet has been rescued, but we can't find out what power she has, and what the Goddess is trying to tell us.
Moreover, Geraint has to stay in that place to protect the Prophet.

${user_nick}$
She can't wake up?

$Bishop Ignacio$
Court Sorceress Kayleen seems to be looking through the arcane spells of the Fairystar. So I'm looking through the records of divine spells of our Order.

${user_nick}$
Is there a way?

$Bishop Ignacio$
I've found a remedy that looks convincing.
I would like to try waking her up with the arcane spells of the Order. Can you pass my message to Geraint?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

${user_nick}$
What? Me?

journal.trigger_string: 후반부 업데이트 때 수정해야 할 것. 1. 목표 알리미 모드 custom 으로 수정해야 됨 2. 퀘스트 아이콘 NPC 39로 세팅
journal.title: Farewell
journal.contents:
Argenta said that she is going to Lotus Marsh. Since everything is over now, go to Saint Haven Royal Castle and report to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: Good News
journal.contents:
Pass the news that Rose has been rescued. Talk to Elite Soldier Calrim.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Elite Soldier Calrim
journal.destination: Deliver the news to Elite Soldier Calrim
journal.todo_msg: Pass the news that Rose has been rescued to Elite Soldier Calrim.

journal.title: Business of the Humans I
journal.contents:
You have sent the letter. Return to Bishop Ignacio.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: You have delivered the letter. Please talk to Bishop Ignacio again.

journal.title: Business of the Humans II
journal.contents:
People have a lot of things to say about cleaning up the mess created during the war. Talk to King Cassius first.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → King Cassius
journal.todo_msg: Listen to the story of King Cassius

journal.title: Business of the Humans III
journal.contents:
King Cassius seems to have accepted letting Geraint stay at the Royal Castle Basement. Talk to Duke Stuart.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Duke Stuart

journal.title: Business of the Humans IV
journal.contents:
It seems like Duke Stuart is planning to make up a story to give full credit to the King for winning the war. Talk to General Douglas.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → General Douglas

journal.title: Business of the Humans V
journal.contents:
General Douglas is upset about how the Gold Dragon and the Prophet are being prioritized instead of the wounded soldiers. Talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.destination: Talk to Court Court Sorceress Kayleen
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Court Sorceress Kayleen

journal.title: The Prophet's Sleep
journal.contents:
You have talked to all the nobles in the castle. Talk to Bishop Ignacio again.

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Please talk to Bishop Ignacio again.
